desc: Local independent florist in Ely offering same day flower delivery to Ely and the surrounding area such as Witchford, Littleport, Soham, Haddenham & Wilburton. Send flowers in Ely today with Thatch & Roses. We also offer wedding flowers, flower subscriptions, plants and much more.

layout.text: Seasonal & Imaginative Floral Artistry for Homes & Lives
